tool_description: Parses and validates customer deletion requests, extracting key requirements and scope parameters for processing.

request_text.description: Raw deletion request text from customer

customer_id.description: Customer identifier associated with the request

request_source.description: Source of the request: email, web_form, phone, or letter

strict_parsing.description: Whether to apply strict parsing rules

error_messages: Invalid request format: Deletion request text is empty or improperly formatted.
Customer verification failed: Customer ID does not match request details.
Ambiguous request scope: Request contains conflicting or unclear deletion requirements.
Unsupported language: The specified language is not supported for parsing.
Incomplete request: Required elements are missing from the deletion request.
usage: Provide request_text containing customer's deletion request and matching customer_id. Optionally specify request_source, language, and strict_parsing level. Returns structured deletion requirements.

deletion_scope.description: Scope of deletion requested: full_account, specific_data, or partial_account

data_categories.description: Specific data categories requested for deletion

urgency_level.description: Request urgency: standard, expedited, or immediate

special_instructions.description: Any special instructions or requirements from customer

verification_required.description: Whether additional customer verification is needed
